page.title: 11Light Industry 1
page.content: There are two complexes of small business ventures. Cross Country caravans leases one and a half acres, and sells 150 caravans and awnings a year. Repair work is carried out, and there is a winter storage area for caravans. 8 local people are employed, and caravans are sold in neighbouring counties also. A Computer Services company, employing 3 people, provides video-texts, data systems and back-up services. Hardware is no longer supplied, but software sales and services cover the whole country. In the same complex, there is a one-man car paint spraying business, and a two-man enterprise selling industrial cleaning machines. A farm management business has an office in the main house and controls several farms to the south of this area.
